attributes.action: Reopen Leyland police station in Lancashire
attributes.additional_details: We need our police station back open
attributes.background: We need more police back on the streets of Leyland. Crime rates are up in Leyland since we have had all these cuts

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition as the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Local police services are the responsibility of your local elected Police and Crime Commissioner. You can contact your local PCC here:

http://www.apccs.police.uk/find-your-pcc/ 

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/244553
